inclusion.criterion: probable or possible CAA according to the recently criteria proposed by Auriel et al.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical data For each patient, the following demographic and clinical data were systematically recorded: age, gender, neurological medical history, independence, neurological symptoms, initial evolution at discharge, treatment type and duration and follow-up data.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory data included ApoE genotype in n=20 patients and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) analysis (n=25 patients).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MRI examinations were performed either at 1.5 or 3 Tesla for all the patients upon routine clinical care.
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
